abstract: Texas Gov Rick Perry seeks to win over social conservative voters in Iowa as he draws a distinction between his opposition to abortion with the views of his leading Republican rivals.
snippet: Gov. Rick Perry offered veiled criticism of Herman Cain, who said last week that he was against abortion, but that the decision to have one was personal.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry offered veiled criticism of Herman Cain, who said last week that he was against abortion, but that the decision to have one was personal.

headline.main: Abortion Takes Center Stage at Iowa G.O.P. Forum
headline.print_headline: Abortion Takes Center Stage at Iowa G.O.P. Forum
headline.seo: Abortion Takes Center Stage at Iowa Forum for Republicans
